website_summaries.verdict: The Kicker Tabor headphones deliver clear Bluetooth audio with a focus on mids, but many will find them lacking in bass.
pros: Quality, balanced audio performance with no distortion
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Doesn't automatically power off when not in use

customer_reviews.title: They will make you deaf
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is amazing you almost won't believe it's blutooth and not with a wire (it does include it but I don't use it). Way better than Beats and cheaper too. Also durable I've dropped them a couple times already and no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: if stationary or sitting nice sound just like my kickers with
customer_reviews.text: music cuts in and out with movement. if stationary or sitting nice sound just like my kickers with jack
customer_reviews.author: HellCat💜

customer_reviews.title: Received defective, had to order another pair.
customer_reviews.text: Updated 12/31/16 Below: I want to love these headphones but this order came defective. I fully charged headphones but they would not turn on. Contacted Amazon and am returning these. I had to purchase another pair. I will review those once I receive them and test them out. 12/31/16 Headphones sound amazing. I love Kicker products.
customer_reviews.author: Alex E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son for Christmas. This pair replaced an earlier pair he had for a few years. Thanks to Amazon I got these for 9.99 due to the Amazon credit card offer that gave us a $100 gift card for applying. Winner winner...
customer_reviews.author: Laura Keener

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely awesome! My friends who owned beats where stunned by the sound quality and bass. Not to mention the comfort and build quality! Highly recommend these headphones as they have aged well and battery holds charge even after a year of heavy use. I've not experienced any Bluetooth issue like other reviewers. I pair it to a fire hd8 , one plus 3t, and oneplus 5t with out any issues.
customer_reviews.author: tcald

customer_reviews.title: Unreal
customer_reviews.text: Kickers motto is or was, from what I remember , " livin' it loud" and these headphones can prove that. enough bass to make your brain shake and loud enough to make your ears bleed (not literally) the case is nice and great for storage. the sound is great, glad i purchased. these are better than all the beats and sennheisers out there available today.
customer_reviews.author: jamin

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them back in May and they work perfectly fine. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted me 29 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: By the title you should know why its two stars, it would have been 1 star but despite the bluetooth not powering on anymore these headphones has great sound quality and i still can use them via auxilery cord but i used them for work now im back to using cord until i can do some research on some top tier bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones everyday they last bout 10 hours, they are very durable, and loud, the sound is awesome and I work around barking dogs and even though they aren't advertised as noise cancelling, they sure do drown out everything around you, this is the 3rd pair I have purchased for the family they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Green

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father for his birthday and he loved them!!!! Said they work better than his beats. 10/10 recomendó
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a pair about 2 years ago on a different site and paid double. We bought these ones for my son and he loves them too. You get more that what you pay for. GREAT PRODUCT AND SELLER
customer_reviews.author: Leca Logan

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to wear when flying. They connect ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear when flying. They connect to bluetooth with ease. Wish I had paid the extra to get noise canceling. . .
customer_reviews.author: Kay D

customer_reviews.title: What a great product, I love them
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, I love them. Battery last a very long time and the product comes securely packaged. Arrived quickly to my home and I will shop through this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Do not drop these!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about them. Have broken them but purchase another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Prince

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't trade these for any other. Just excellent in every way. Very balanced, Bass is SOLID, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: IceKold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these for playing games at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Npedraza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are really great. Good imaging and comfortable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Allen L. Boogaard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very comfortable. I like that adjustable channel and volume control on the ear piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome sound .....And Kicker too oh ya these head phones rock
customer_reviews.author: JasonWyle

customer_reviews.title: love the bass
customer_reviews.text: love the bass. the clarity of of the music was great. never heard of kicker having headphones, till i found these. love them.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Where is the bass?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Extremely comfortable - Light - Loud Cons: - Lacking in the bass department
customer_reviews.author: L. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not without faults
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great however the Bluetooth range and connection is questionable, I personally thought it would be better
customer_reviews.author: Kevin pearce

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because have had previous experience with Kicker audio in my car. Recieved them and immediately tried them on. Sounded great. Although, the more I listened to them, the better they sounded. I suggest playing them for an hour or so continously to break them in. No complaints. Battery life is great. Charges up quickly. Comes with a nice carrying pouch to keep protected against scratches. Best value for you price.
customer_reviews.author: Shiv Patel

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best headphones I have ever had the bass on bass ...
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones I have ever had the bass on bass boosted songs on YouTube when you put these on full blast the bass makes them vibrate on your ears and when your more relaxed the clarity of the songs is 100% these headphones are amazing definitely worth the money and they are so much better than beats or JBL I love them :)
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Hilty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, good audio with plenty of bass
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good audio with plenty of bass. The bluetooth connection was very weak and would occasionaly cut out while listening to music, so I returned them. They worked perfectly when plugged into the headphone jack. I suppose it could be that I just got a bad unit, but I can't say as I haven't bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great kicker product
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Why pay 350 and up to beats audio. I have a pair of studios and I actually prefer these kickers over them. Definitely recommend them to any one looking for over the ear Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.author: ROY ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: The headphones work great when you can get them to pair to a ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work great when you can get them to pair to a blue tooth source. When the item first arrived I inspected the item charged up the headphone set until it reached a full charge. At first the headphones would pair with out any problems but now can not even get them to pair to a simple blue tooth transmitter. For as much money the charge for these headphones this really should not be a issue. I would recommend that you steer clear of these headphones. When they work they are good but when they do not work, well...
customer_reviews.author: kerrie carter

customer_reviews.title: I like my music loud when I workout got so frustrated ...
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth cuts in and out .I like my music loud when I workout got so frustrated with them sent them back so so bummed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones hobbled by Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good, but unfortunately did not work well in my circumstances where Bluetooth audio is always iffy. I don't necessarily blame the headphones, because I've tried other bluetooth audio devices that also didn't work well in my office. So I've concluded that 1. my environment may be challenging and 2. Bluetooth is generally flaky and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Fyodor Sukhov

customer_reviews.title: I loved the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved the headphones, but the charging system is very flawed. The one sent to me didnt hold a charge for very long and eventually stopped being able to charge within a few months. Overall, Im very dissapointed with my transaction on this high ticket item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: NO GOOD!!! They are extremely fussy trying to pair with the Bluetooth in my PC or a TaoTronics wireless stereo transmitter (both are A2DP). They will pair after you mess around with them for QUITE A WHILE if you have the time..frustrating Really not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: He can hear me now!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our college student and he loves them. He also has no excuse for not hearing me now! Ha ha ha!! They have good range away from his computer or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of kickers! I love them so much I will never buy other brands!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Kicker Battery problems
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of these headphones at Costco lasted 13 months, it would not charge at all, contacted Kicker and they were nice enough to send me a new pair. Well guess what, after 13 months unable to charge, contacted Kicker and they said sorry bad battery, total change of attitude, maybe they thought I was going to rip them off or something. Thanks to the great return policy at Costco my purchase was refunded in full. I would never never never recommend Kicker Bluetooth headphones, unless you only want to use them for 12 or 13 months then toss them.
customer_reviews.author: Gondolfo

customer_reviews.title: These sound great if you have a good sound
customer_reviews.text: If you want good sound then this is it, you have to have a good sound card and they will rock.
customer_reviews.author: don w

customer_reviews.title: There highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these headphones bc I listened to them for a whole hour and the sound is amazing they have very good bass and the cushions that's on them it's very comfortable I fell in love with these headphones they sound real amazing
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: bought earphones year ago and battery life is very disappointing would not recommend these to anyone bad skipping on bluetooth and phone is right next to them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fully charged it and it still not working sound good but the Bluetooth does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: These headphones Lasted me only one day the Bluetooth started going on and off i fully charged it and it still not working sound good but the Bluetooth does not work properly
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lofton

customer_reviews.title: They do sound good when working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones and they worked for a month and a half. The micro usb slot where you plug in the charger broke and they no longer charge. They do sound good when working, but unfortunately they are built so cheaply. I do not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kicker HP402BTB Tabor Bluetooth Wireless Headphones
product_meta.description: aptX Lossless Bluetooth audio coding; 3-button mic/remote on optional cable; black w/ yellow accents
feature_bullets: aptX Lossless audio codec for best Bluetooth sound
Rechargeable battery rated at 10 hours and charged with USB micro source

Flat cable included for a direct-connect option when wireless isn't available. Cable includes 1-button, in-line remote and mic for audio control and hands-free calling. Connectivity Technology: Bluetooth and wired

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
